metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15589 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.9.x allowing x86 HVM guest OSusers to obtain sensitive information from the host OS (or an arbitraryguest OS) because intercepted I/O operations can cause a write of data fromuninitialized hypervisor stack memory.

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
